content: stylish with an interesting construction - these fingerless gloves are worked flat and use short row to form a circle around the thumb because of this unusual construction they are great to show off variegated yarn these mitts are the crochet version of my knitted starburst mitts 1 **german version ** eine deutsche version 2 wurde durch eifelgirl1 3 heike von heikeshaekellust 4 erstellt vielen lieben dank **french version** une version française 5 a été élaboré par sophie gelfi de easy crochet merci beaucoup 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/starburst-mitts 2 https //knitting-and-so-on blogspot de/2016/12/sparkler-mitts-auf-deutsch html 3 http //www ravelry com/people/eifelgirl1 4 http //heikeshaekellust blogspot de 5 http //easycrochet canalblog com/pages/sparkler-mitts-de-sybil-r-version-francaise/36092907 html
